acdecom.WaveGuide.get_radius¶

WaveGuide.get_radius(self)¶

Returns the radius or an equivalent measure for the waveguide.

Returns

If the waveguide’s cross section is “circular”, the radius is returned. If the waveguide is “rectangular”, the hydraulic radius is returned. Otherwise, dimension[0] is returned.

Return type

float

acdecom.WaveGuide.get_psi_rect
